value.name: Black protesters say focus on feds hasn’t derailed message
value.description: After George Floyd’s death at the hands of Minneapolis police, people in Portland came out in droves to protest police brutality and racism, chanting that “Black lives matter.” As the weeks

value.name: I’m Antwon Rose’s mother. My son had to be killed by police in order for him to change the world.
value.description: Antwon Rose II, a 17-year-old, was killed June 19, 2018, in East Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Antwon’s mother, Michelle Kenney, reflects on her son's life and legacy.

video.name: Michelle Kenney is still fighting for her son Antwon Rose II

value.name: Gov. Wolf signs bills for use-of-force registry, stronger background checks for cops in Pa.
value.description: After an East Pittsburgh police officer shot and killed Antwon Rose II two years ago, critics of the officer wondered how he had been hired so easily after facing previous misconduct complaints. Rose would have celebrated his 20th birthday Sunday The officer,

value.name: Protesters Confront Pittsburgh Police in Riot Gear During Demonstration
value.description: Protesters in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, confronted police in riot gear during a Black Lives Matter demonstration on July 11. Marchers chanted for Antwon Rose on Saturday to commemorate what would have been his 19th birthday.

value.name: Black Lives Matter mural in downtown Pittsburgh vandalized
value.description: Artists were back out at the Black Lives Matter Mural in downtown Pittsburgh on Monday. They had to repaint parts of it after someone painted curse words and the word "thug" over the Mural of Antwon Rose.

value.name: New PA law requiring police conduct database hailed by State Attorney General Shapiro
value.description: State Attorney General Josh Shapiro says police reforms signed into law by Gov. Tom Wolf on Tuesday make Pennsylvania "one of the first states to act in a tangible way in passing new laws since the killing of George Floyd.

video.name: New PA law requiring police conduct database hailed by State Attorney General Shapiro

value.name: George Floyd-inspired bills become law in Pa.
value.description: The first bills passed by Pennsylvania’s Legislature in response to widespread protests over police brutality and the killing of George Floyd became law Tuesday with Gov. Tom

value.name: Mothers of Ahmaud Arbury, Breonna Taylor and Tamir Rice speak
